messages.subject: unschooling experts
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/8/2003 4:22:06 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes: Sandra wrote:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/8/2003 4:22:06 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
Sandra wrote:



<<And will it be my personal problem when my name comes up somewhere,
> someday
> when someone's trying to defend their doing nothing as unschooling?
>
> I wonder if Mary Griffith worries about that. <g>>>


Yeah, she does! I went to her talk about worries at the conference in
Sacremento and she talked a lot about her worries since she's now considered
a "homeschooling expert" because she wrote books.



-Pam T.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
